GSD.description:
tpm: use try_get_ops() in tpm-space.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.1 by commit ba84f9a48366dcc3cdef978599433efe101dd5bd. For more details please see the references link.
